rows.text_1:
Want to help your child develop and grow?

Invite your child to play with you today. Encourage them to ask questions and explore new things through play.
rows.media_title: How it helped a parent like you:
rows.media_transcript:
My son was not really talking. I was worried about it, but did not know how I could help him. 

ParentApp gave me lots of ideas for how I could spend time with him. By playing together, we were able to practise many words in a fun way. He is speaking much more now, and we are closer because of the time we spend together.
